KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.000!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: It is not long before Eidos is completely robbed of sight. The going through this way is treacherous; for with all rays of golden sun consumed by the shadows, there is no light to guide her way. Many times she stumbles and cuts herself on the jagged crust of the uncertain and winding tunnel.\n\n\t\tThe echoes of her steps expand and she halts abruptly. She can feel her vision slowly returning. As she tentatively renews her forward march, a cold, cerulean glow comes into view, brighter and more radiant than natural phosphorous could ever be. Soon, she finds the cryptic light's source: a shining, aquamarine glass lies on the cave floor, seemingly discarded.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.001!DESCRIP.dialogue_text:
It is not long before Eidos is completely robbed of sight. The going through this way is treacherous; for with all rays of golden sun consumed by the shadows, there is no light to guide her way. Many times she stumbles and cuts herself on the jagged crust of the uncertain and winding tunnel.

		The echoes of her steps expand and she halts abruptly. She can feel her vision slowly returning as her eyes cease resisting the darkness. The amorphous forms now take on the shape of rock, scarred by their vain battles against water and time.

		Then, a vision, a memory, the Mindscape. Though Eidos has not been here, she has before seen this place in her dreams. She knows that further ahead, the path widens into a more spacious chamber and that someone there abides.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.002!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: The sun at her back, Eidos enters into the rocky mouth of the cave. Her eyes observantly attending to her new surroundings, she spies a short passage spread out before her, where light is at war with the shadows. The cave's stony fangs act as the shields for a clearly outmatched darkness.\n\n\t\tIn truth, the light only gained greater ground after Eidos had opened the portal leading from the canyon. Yet, this advance is swiftly stifled by the resealing of the entrance. As such, the shadows now seep back in, reconquering their lost ground.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.0020!DESCRI.dialogue_text: But the passage ends almost as soon as it begins, terminating in a spherical chamber more radiant than the setting sun. A series of variegated crystals direct their focused beams into a single, suspended white sphere at the center of the room.\n\n\t\tBeneath the brilliant globe is a golden platform, much like the one in the Awakening Chamber, yet distinct in its markings. Its saccharine presence entices, like honey for the mind. Its metallic scent permeates the room, seeping into Eidos' pores, as if it seeking to join forms with her.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.00200!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos ceremoniously proceeds toward the platform, expectations of their eventual union rising in her boiling blood. It appears just as though her ultimate destiny lay right before her very eyes.\n\n\t\tCould this be the answer she has been searching for? Or has she been remiss not to search? Will this lead her to the questions that will shape her truth?

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.00201!DESCR.dialogue_text: Her left foot planted firmly on the subtly elevated platform, Eidos floats up onto the two-dimensional, golden spheroid. Canting her head skyward, she stares intently into the glowing orb above it, ready to receive the wisdom of the universe...

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.0021!DESCRI.dialogue_text: And as with most expectations, hers remain unrequited.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.00210!DESCR.dialogue_text: No, not even emptiness fills her now in this ineffable state of profuse confusion and awkward embarrassment. What was she in fact expecting? Why this elaborate setup for nothing?\n\n\t\tAnti-climactic, perhaps, but then again, expectation is the mother of disappointment.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.002100!DESC.dialogue_text: Thus, perhaps out of shame, or perhaps due to some insight yet to be understood, Eidos decides to sleep. Leaden eyelids succumb to gravity, sealing out the radiance of the crystals. And slowly, as Eidos' Falseflesh collapses upon the disc, so too does her Trueflesh fall into a deep slumber.

D.response_text: SUR

E.response_text: TYR

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.200!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: The crystal shines with a soft light, a light that begins to weep azure tears into her palm. Looking within, she sees... nothing. A blue void is all that looks back when gazing into this glass.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.000!DESCRIP.dialogue_text:
A faint sound whispers into her ear, alerting her to the presence of trickling water ahead. Licking her chapped lips, Eidos does her best to ignore the insistent pangs of thirst, but still quickens her pace toward the enticing sound. A lightening of her surroundings gives birth to a dim vision of the jagged rocks that have torn her clothes and skin.

		Abruptly, the tunnel opens into a large cavern, made visible by sparse, delicate beams of sunlight cast through cracks in the ceiling. Another passage leads from this chamber beyond, but most importantly, a small trickle of water runs down a crack in one of the far walls.

		The light unveils one more surprise, for a glimmer from the other side of the curtain of sun rays steals her attention: eyes, hawk-like, piercing through both darkness and light. Reclining against a stone across the chamber sits their owner in silent vigil, motionless, relentless.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X009!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Stepping into the darkness of the cave passage, Eidos is once again plunged into blindness. Reaching into her memory, Eidos navigates the twisting labyrinth without incident.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.009!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Stepping into the darkness of the cave passage, Eidos is once again plunged into blindness. Reaching into her memory, Eidos navigates the twisting labyrinth without incident.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X010!DESCRI.dialogue_text: She steps into the scantly-illuminated cavern home of the hermit once more. He looks to be in a state of quiet contemplation, reclining against the wall, though in an upright position. Eyes closed, but ever-vigilant, it seems to her as though he has not moved from this spot since she was here last.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.010!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: She steps into the scantly-illuminated cavern home of the hermit once more. He looks to be in a state of quiet contemplation, reclining against the wall, though in an upright position. Eyes closed, but ever-vigilant, it seems to her as though he has not moved from this spot since she was here last.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.011!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Eidos steps into the scantly-illuminated cavern home of the defeated Adarin once more. The hermit's emptied Falseflesh litters the ground, decomposing itself and tirelessly struggling to reintegrate into the cracks in the stony floor, to return whence it came.\n\n\t\tIt seems that even in death Adarin cannot find a release from his struggle.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X012!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Eidos alerts the hermit of her intent to speak. He, in turn, emits an aura of derisive assurance that Eidos could not possibly comprehend the depth of his thought, the look of someone who thinks he knows 'too much'.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.013!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Adarin seeks the solace and understanding that he believes only pensive brooding can provide - perhaps he believes himself to be an island on dry land? Eidos is thus left to think on what she will do next.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X001!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Eidos wanders about - up and down, left and right - in the darkness with all the characteristic shifts in confidence of gradual understanding that thinking something is easy does not make it so.\n\n\t\tHer failure, though, is soon forgotten when she inexplicably, yet unavoidably, arrives back at the crevice through which she entered. The weight of folly can now be cast aside and accountability for poor decisions completely forgotten as she enters the Wellspring anew.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.001!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Other than the tunnel from which she emerged, there are two paths of egress - both seeming nearly identical, save for the distinct trickling sound heard from the path to the right.

B.response_text: Exit the grotto to the canyon

C.response_text: Take the right hand path toward the trickle

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.200!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Eidos travels through the darkness of the cave for what could be days, weeks or mere hours, constantly haunted by the sound of dripping water. She was supposed to be tracking it, yet the echoes of the cavern make it an elusive prey. Or perhaps it, allied with forces unknown, is plotting her demise leading her on a hopeless chase, mocking the very idea of her effort in seeking an illusion...

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X2000!DESCR.dialogue_text: But then, despair is ousted as Eidos discovers a narrow hollow containing rivulets of water dripping from the ceiling. Straight ahead, is a crude set of stairs. They wind their way up a steep rock face, terminating at a crack in the rock. Beyond is a light distinct in nature from the sun.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.2000!DESCRI.dialogue_text: But then, despair is ousted as Eidos discovers a narrow hollow containing rivulets of water dripping from the ceiling. Yet Eidos, as of instinct, dares not draw too near; for she senses the familiar effects of Corruption having touched these glassy beads of poison. They are an illusion after all: the illusion of life obscuring the reality of death contained within.\n\n\t\tStraight ahead, is a crude set of stairs. They wind their way up a steep rock face, terminating at a crack in the rock. Beyond is a light distinct in nature from the sun.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.201!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: As Eidos descends the stair, the composition and condition of the steps begin to change. What once was finely cut stone has given way to roughly assembled blocks, now in disarray, their surfaces uneven and made difficult to navigate by the water that can be heard trickling down them. She staggers as she blindly reaches the bottom.\n\n\t\tWith one hand clutching the side of the tunnel, Eidos now faces a natural cave system. This subterranean space is entirely lightless and can be known only by the feel of the timeworn stone and the sound of footfalls upon it.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.X201!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Eidos casts the crystal down, shattering it into uncountable pieces. A blinding wave of blue energy washes over her, and for a brief time, all emotion is washed from her consciousness.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.2010!DESCRI.dialogue_text: When the tide of emptiness has passed, no trace of the crystal remains. Eidos stands in the dark once more, but is not the darkness of the cavern. No, this void is too thorough to be the caverns. She feels nothing yet senses everything.\n\n\t\tBut before she has a chance to clear her head, the blinding white light comes again...

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.201!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Eidos casts the crystal down, shattering it into uncountable pieces. A blinding wave of blue energy washes over her, and for a brief time, all emotion is washed from her consciousness, leaving naught but the cold ambivalence of Luin's embrace.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.2011!DESCRI.dialogue_text: ...Slowly, waking after an unknowable span of time, Eidos finds she is once more enveloped in the darkness of the cave, Falseflesh intact.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.202!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Gripping the glass tightly, Eidos reaches out with her Trueflesh and seeks the crystallized thought within: the Scroll of Introspection greets her with its knowledge as she welcomes the crystal's contents into her being using the Techne of Extraction.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!9.203!DESCRIP.dialogue_text: Without a second thought, Eidos decides to let sleeping crystals lie. No saying what mind-altering contents might haunt its inner workings and prudence would dictate that it's best not to find out...

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!90.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text: The Sunless Grotto reeks of corrupted flesh, melting into prima materia, becoming one once more with its source.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!90.001!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Eidos steps into the scantly illuminated cavern. What once was Adarin's sanctum has now become his tomb. With the exception of the hermit's slain body, there is nothing else in this place.

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!99.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Adarin has achieved his exodus from the mortal coil, leaving behind his slayer, but nothing else.

A.response_text: "I mean no harm. Who are you?"

D.response_text: "I seek the master of this canyon. Is that you?"

E.response_text: "Am I supposed to be afraid of you?"

F.response_text: "Sits a man in a cave. Curious. I see no club or loincloth."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.100!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "Names have little use for me here; you may call me what you will."

E.response_text: "So then, you are a coward."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.200!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I was driven to this place by fear, but now, I fear nothing."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2000!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "And because I fear nothing, I see no reason to leave this place."

A.response_text: "For what reason do you live alone?"

D.response_text: "Perhaps you can tell me of this place and its secrets..."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.400!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "There are no masters here, no Jinns to fear, no idols to worship."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4000!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Return to Dazir, Tambul or the Dawn Fortress if you wish to find some."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4001!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Here, there is but you, me and nature."

D.response_text: "Perhaps you can tell me of this place and its secrets..."

E.response_text: "So you flee from fear? You must be a coward."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.500!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I came here to purify myself of fear; what you feel does not concern me."

D.response_text: "Perhaps you can tell me of this place and its secrets..."

E.response_text: "Then you are a coward."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.600!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I came here to purify myself of fear; what you expect to see does not concern me."

E.response_text: "So you flee from fear? You must be a coward."

F.response_text: "What? You mean Cavetrash McGee doesn't care about me? I'm hurt!"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.101!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "The Self is weak and becomes weaker when bolstered by others."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "The senses are burned away by the fire of their minds."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1011!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "But these flames are dim lamps compared to the sun, and more easily snuffed by wind and water."

A.response_text: "You are wrong: without others we are mere beasts."

E.response_text: "The weak are weak; this is not new nor does it concern me."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "This artifice forged in man's kiln blind the eye so that it can only see the flame and nothing beyond."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2011!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Cast from the city walls, the canyon and the lands beyond are filled with their shadows."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2013!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "The lamps of the city shine, searing the True Eyes with its False Lights."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2014!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Illuminating merely the ego, not the Self."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2015!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I had to escape my weakness, to live here in the depths and darkness so that I may see the True Light."

A.response_text: "You are wrong: without others we are mere beasts."

C.response_text: "And so, you simply abide here unmoving."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Secrets only arise from dividing the world into known and unknown."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4012!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I know only myself; that is all."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4013!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Perhaps you believe you know this place, or can come to know it; that may be, though I doubt it."

C.response_text: "And so, you simply abide here unmoving."

D.response_text: "A homeless wretch pontificating about knowledge? A conceit, I think."

E.response_text: "You are pathetic and weak."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.5010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I feared the canyon; I feared darkness and shadow."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.5012!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "My darkness was born from the light of the city."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.5013!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I had to escape the city, and the weakness that was instilled in me by those within."

A.response_text: "You are wrong: without others we are mere beasts."

D.response_text: "I imagine a friendless, homeless man knows much of weakness..."

E.response_text: "You yourself are weak; do not blame others."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.601!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I have had my fill of people and their false knowledge."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.6010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "If my abode puzzles you, perhaps it is because you have not yet slaked your thirst for lies."

F.response_text: "I can write my own lies! Observe: 'You don't smell like sewage.'"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Indeed, that is what they called me. The Lord of Beasts."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "They were as you are: lost and blinded."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1022!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "And now their blindness has become eternal and their lives ended in darkness."

A.response_text: "Who are 'they'? Where did you come from?"

B.response_text: "But what is there to fear within that darkness?"

E.response_text: "You are the one who is lost, peddling your gutter-tramp philosophy."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Here I know no illusion; the world I see is as it appears to me."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2022!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "In pure existence, I am beyond harm - beyond the darkness that consumed them."

A.response_text: "Who are 'them'? Where did you come from?"

B.response_text: "What is there to be feared within the darkness?"

C.response_text: "You live a life of will, not purity."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.302!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "The world is moving and I move with it; I feel it change and feel it change me."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.3020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "You are too caught in the webs of your illusions to see it."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.3021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "You are the one who is stilled, walking in circles and blinded by the mind's fire."

B.response_text: "But what is there... within that darkness?"

C.response_text: "You live a life of will; you are no different than I."

D.response_text: "Yet, even you must fear death."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.402!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I know what you are; I too was once caught in the webs of my illusions."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "You see me as weak or arrogant."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "But what can you truly see, when you are so blinded by the mind's fire?"

C.response_text: "You live a life of will; you are no different than I."

D.response_text: "Yet, even you must fear death."

E.response_text: "You are the one who is blind, peddling your gutter-tramp philosophy."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.502!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "You act as if you are not weak; but yours are the thoughts and actions of a fearful soul."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.5020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Why else put on such a bold display?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.5021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I have seen it before I have been it before."

A.response_text: "What would a hermit know of fellowship?"

D.response_text: "Yet, even you must fear death."

E.response_text: "You know nothing of me, lowly tramp."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.602!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I know what you are; I too was once caught in the webs of my illusions."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.6020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "You see me as weak or arrogant; but what can you truly see, when you are so blinded by the mind's fire?"

F.response_text: "If you were really sick of people, wouldn't you just ignore me?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.103!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I had brothers and sisters once, when my mind was blackened by the mind's fire."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.1030!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "This fire blinded them all, and they walked into darkness."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.X1032!ADARI.dialogue_text: "I will not think on it any more; it was a life of falsehood."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2031!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Fear is her path into the darkness of the Graylands."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2032!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "I know; I once thought as you do."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2033!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "In fear and darkness I strayed into the Wasteland to find wisdom and power."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2035!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "She would have taken me, were it not for my epiphany: that to be alone, to lose all but the Self, is the only path to truth."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2036!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "But you do not need me to tell you this; as you revel in the darkness, do you not?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.2037!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Why else would you keep looking for answers, if not to confirm how little you truly know?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.X2038!ADARI.dialogue_text: "Now leave; I have no interest in your madness."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.303!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "My will is formed by the world around me; In waking and in dream I see the world as it is."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.4032!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "We are and then are not; Death never comes."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.X4033!ADARI.dialogue_text: "Pointless to avoid illusions; doing so only gives them reality."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.X503!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "You are screaming to a deaf world; I cannot hear you stranger."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!0.X603!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Indeed, perhaps I am not so removed as I had hoped; a problem easily remedied."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.000!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "Do not stay long; I have no wish to know you or your business."

B.response_text: "Were you once a master of Techne?"

D.response_text: "My business is uninteresting, but yours..."

E.response_text: "I will stay however long I please."

F.response_text: "I don't have business. I have Biz-Nass!"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X100!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "There is nothing here for you; there is nothing here for anyone."

E.response_text: "Your commands do not sway me, hermit."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.200!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "No, rather Techne mastered me, branded as slave."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X2000!ADARI.dialogue_text: "I have cast it aside along with its chains that once bound me."

D.response_text: "So you're useless now? Then I see no reason to stay."
"A man of words equal to his intellect, I see. Farewell."

E.response_text: "Speak, or screams of agony will soon be all you utter."

A.response_text: "Silent when challenged? Some conviction! Farewell, fool."

D.response_text: "A man of words equal to his intellect, I see. Farewell."

E.response_text: "Speak, or screams of agony will soon be all you utter."

F.response_text: "No? How about, Bid-Nis? How does that grab ya?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.201!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "I have no knowledge; I have merely abandoned my pretension."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.2010!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "There is nothing for you here, if you come seeking mastery."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.2011!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "By the time I journeyed here, I had rid myself of all but a single tome... And now, I have surpassed the need for even that."

A.response_text: "How can you repay your debt to your comrades without your skills?"

D.response_text: "Why hide in this cave then, oh great sage?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X102!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Debts? I have no parts in such covenants any longer; I take shelter with no one."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.202!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "You come seeking; but if you had found what you sought, would you have ceased your wanderings?"

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.2020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "No, it would have just given way to yet more searching; all in vain."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.2021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "Wander these tunnels and find my lost tome; take solace in the minds you find within."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X2022!ADARI.dialogue_text: "Or search the underhalls of the Wellspring in the caves beyond until it drives you mad; it will do you no good."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.502!ADARIN!.dialogue_text: "It is true; I came here because I was afraid."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.5020!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "But I am changed; I feel nothing."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.5021!ADARIN.dialogue_text: "No terror can compel me to your cause."

KABU!CANYON!SUNLESS GROTTO!1.X5022!ADARI.dialogue_text: "I can do no right nor wrong, for I know not what 'it' is."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!00.000!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos cautiously climbs down the ruined path until she has reached the belly of the canyon, its stomach strewn with the remains from millennia of feasting on hapless creatures, stones and rivers that had wandered this far.\n\n\t\tDespite the natural warnings, she slowly walks forward until the moment when she comes upon a bleak sight as she rounds a bend on the path...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!00.001!DESCR.dialogue_text: Seeking to move, Eidos finds herself near the location whence she descended into the canyon. She recalls that up the treacherous path is the way to the walls of Tambul; the Bone Pile is to her right; and further access deeper into the canyon is left.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text:
The canyon widens and it seems that a massive mound of bones has accumulated over countless generations. The shape and size of the thousands of skulls leaves no doubt that these are decayed and decaying humans. The mound is piled high at the west side of the canyon, but the bleached remains spill out to cover most of the clearing. Perhaps most seek not to venture beyond this point?

		Looking skyward, Eidos can see an the glimmering sparkle of the imposing silver spire towering high above. The shining steeple casts dancing reflections from the sun across the grisly hill of death. The canyon floor is near invisible from the bones that litter the ground, in a scattered tumult of memories and dreams now lost to time, but held on to by the living who come to honor them.

		However, this place is not devoid of life. Indeed, two armed guards stand before her, vigilantly monitoring her every move. Eidos can see another, unarmed individual further in, prostrating himself before a smaller, separate pile of bones.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X001!DESCR.dialogue_text: As Eidos walks forward, the guards mirror her motions, coming forth to meet her. One is a grizzled veteran, gray of beard, lithe of step. His companion is a young woman, ripe with the impetuous impulses of youth - actions taken before good judgment gives the order, words spoken before thoughts can rein them in...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.X000!DESCR.dialogue_text: Abruptly, the older warrior lifts his hand to silence Assala.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.X001!DESCR.dialogue_text: The two guards walk back a few paces. While Hubbiyh seems to take a more relaxed stance, Assala eyes Eidos, her knuckles white as they grip her spear's shaft.\n\n\t\tThe way ahead clear, Eidos is free to go where she will.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!2.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Enraged, Assala begins to level her spear and now conflict seems unavoidable...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!2.X000!DESCR.dialogue_text: That is, until she is stayed by her companion.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text:
Assala levels her spear at Eidos. In the space of a thought she is piercing through the air directly towards Eidos' face with the inhuman speed and fluidity of a seasoned veteran.

		Instinctively, Eidos stumbles backwards, raising her arms in defense. With a will not her own, she calls forth Luin and brings the ghelblade down upon the offending spearpoint, cleaving the steel in twain. Luin prepares to leap forth and dispatch their attacker, when Eidos observes that Assala's body has slackened, all trace of violent intent leaving her face, now replaced solely with incredulity and even adoration.

		Eidos soon senses that the elder guard now resolutely moves in for a lethal attack...

D.response_text: Strike the other guard

E.response_text: Finish Assala

F.response_text: Kill both of the disguised gremlins!

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.100!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Wrestling the murderous glee welling up within her, Eidos halts Luin's assault. She opens her mouth to speak, but in the span of a heartbeat, the elder's spear thrusts through the space between them unerringly towards her throat...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.X101!DESCR.dialogue_text: Yet it delivers not its promised kiss of death. Instead, the older warrior presses the spear menacingly upon her skin, simply scrutinizing Eidos. Though his face may be bereft of emotion, it remains steadfastly focused.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.200!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Wrestling the murderous glee welling up within her, Eidos withdraws Luin to the confines of her mind, but in the span of a heartbeat, the elder's spear thrusts through the space between them unerringly towards her throat...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.X201!DESCR.dialogue_text: Yet it delivers not its promised kiss of death. Instead, the older warrior presses the spear menacingly upon her skin, simply scrutinizing Eidos. Though his face may be bereft of emotion, it remains steadfastly focused.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.300!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Wrestling the murderous glee welling up within her, Eidos holds Luin in front of herself unflinchingly. But in the span of a blink, the elder's spear thrusts through the space between them unerringly towards her throat...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.X301!DESCR.dialogue_text: Yet it delivers not its promised kiss of death. Instead, the older warrior presses the spear menacingly upon her skin, simply scrutinizing Eidos. Though his face may be bereft of emotion, it remains steadfastly focused.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.400!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Eidos ducks under the second strike while Luin swings upwards, cleaving cleanly through the warrior's leather armor and banishing the life from his Falseflesh.\n\n\t\tTurning about, Eidos looks upon the kneeling form of Assala. The death of her companion has changed her expression of adoration to one of resignation. Whatever feelings Eidos might have toward this pathetic creature are too weak to overcome the awakened thirst within her mind. The emerald-hued sword dances through the air and Luin frees the young warrior's head from her shoulders.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.X500!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos ducks under the second strike while Luin swings upwards, cleaving cleanly through Assala's armor and banishing the life from her body.\n\n\t\tTurning about as the emerald-hued sword dances through the air, Luin frees the elder warrior's head from his shoulders. Though the warrior dies happily knowing that at precisely the same time his spear has penetrated deep into Eidos' chest cavity...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.X600!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos ducks under the second strike while Luin swings upwards, cleaving cleanly through the nefarious gremlin's armor and banishing the life from its body.\n\n\t\tTurning about as the emerald-hued sword whirls through the air, Luin frees the elder gremlin's head from its shoulders. Yet this evil creature dies not unavenged, as his spear appears to have also found its mark, penetrating deep into Eidos' chest cavity...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.000!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Consumed by the tension of the stand off, Hubbiyh and Eidos fail to notice Assala spring up from the ground. Driving her body into Eidos, Assala removes the spear's threat and in a move inscrutable to the stunned onlookers, she impales her chest upon Hubbiyh's outstretched weapon.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.001!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Enemy, turned ally, turned martyr. Assala's actions have understandably shocked both spectators.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.002!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Hubbiyh releases his grip upon the spear and his stoic resolve is broken as he looks into the dying face of his young companion. Though, her eyes are not for him. Turning about she breathes her last, gazing upon Eidos, her weeping eyes filled with adoration.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.003!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Ark.\n\n\t\tMouthing this single syllable, her form falls limp to the canyon floor. Assala is no more.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.004!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Running to the ghostless shell that once contained Assala, Hubbiyh holds her to his chest. Weeping, just as a father would for their dying child, Hubbiyh draws a knife from his belt. Looking skywards, face awash with a chaotic despondence, he plunges the blade directly into his throat, following his charge into the uncertainty of death. Choking on the blood from the self-inflicted wound, he leaves his Falseflesh behind.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.005!DESCRI.dialogue_text: And Eidos is confronted with the reality of mortality anew. She stands alone and out of place, deathless in this desolate final resting ground for those capable of death.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.X000!DESC.dialogue_text: Eidos finds herself in the Valley of Bones. The guards still stand nearby, eying her every step, but are not hindering her.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X000!DESC.dialogue_text: Eidos, as of instinct, draws Luin from the ether. The Valvorthr Assala stares in awe, dropping to her knees and clasping her hands together before her face. Her companion is noticeably less enthusiastic as he directs his spear at Eidos.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X001!DESC.dialogue_text: Hubbiyh's inner conflict ultimately gives way to acquiescence. Clearly, his allegiance is to Assala before all else. Yet from the torn look upon his troubled countenance, it is clear for all to see the stressed thread upon which said allegiance perilously dangles.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.002!DESCR.dialogue_text: Before the elder Tacribian has a chance to regret his decision, Assala begins to lead Eidos up the canyon slope, as the night sky's crystalline stars rise in the east chasing the setting sun. They make for the Moon Keep of Tambul and will surely not be welcomed, given the nature of their flight. Yet Assala is obviously undeterred and will either find a way to their destination or pave one with the corpses of those who stand in her way.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!90.000!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos has returned to the Valley of Bones. The bodies of the slain guards lie here undisturbed, slowly assimilating to the group of bones they once protected.\tNo sign remains of the individual who had been praying here when Eidos claimed their lives, however. His desire to join the ranks of the newly dead were perhaps exceeded by his fear of being unmourned and unremembered.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!90.001!DESCR.dialogue_text: Eidos looks dispassionately upon the two corpses she has added to the floor of the Valley of Bones, the empty shells returning only a vacant stare.\n\n\t\tLooking up, she sees no sign of the individual who had been praying here before the slaughter began. His desire to join the ranks of the newly dead were perhaps exceeded by his fear of being unmourned and unremembered.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!99.000!DESCR.dialogue_text: The two guards who slaughtered Eidos previously do not like the surprise her return affords. Characteristic of veterans of their caliber, they move to intercept their undead enemy without hesitation. Assala nimbly scales the rock face, getting behind Eidos, while Hubbiyh takes advantage of the distraction to charge in for a frontal assault.\n\n\t\tIn the face of the bizarre resurrection, the Tacribians have no fear. Quite the contrary, they appear to be eerily accustomed to it. But in the span of a heartbeat, the warriors have entered their formation to engage the threat.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X0010!DESC.dialogue_text: Communication, but who is worthy of it? Only three contestants are available - the Valvorthr Assala, the elder Tacribian Hubbiyh and a man kneeling before a pile of bones.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.002!DESCRI.dialogue_text: Leaving the bone pile behind, Eidos journeys further into the canyon. The water-cut path is littered with untold eras of fallen, rust-colored stones. The walls reach skyward blocking out the very sun. The perpetual wind steals loosened grains from the hoary sandstone, raining down mineral showers upon Eidos' hair. The canyon floor continually splits, narrows, widens, curves, bends and dips in exquisite labyrinthine form.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.00200!DESC.dialogue_text: In time Eidos loses all sense of direction.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.00201!DESC.dialogue_text: She becomes hopelessly lost - though despair never ails her. Indeed, she simply keeps walking and walking...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.00202!DESC.dialogue_text: ...Until finally she spies something familiar: her own tracks. It appears that Eidos has somehow arrived whence she departed; the Valley of Bones is not far from this point.

A.response_text: Return to the Valley of Bones

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.00203!DESC.dialogue_text: Leaving the cave behind, Eidos now makes the familiar - albeit daunting - trek back toward the bone pile.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12000!DESC.dialogue_text: Leaving the bone pile behind, Eidos journeys further into the canyon. The water-cut path is littered with untold eras of fallen, rust-colored stones. The walls reach skyward blocking out the very sun. The perpetual wind steals loosened grains from the hoary sandstone, raining down mineral showers upon Eidos' hair. The canyon floor continually splits, narrows, widens, curves, bends and dips in exquisite labyrinthine form.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12001!DESC.dialogue_text: In time Eidos loses all sense of direction.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12002!DESC.dialogue_text: She becomes hopelessly lost - though despair never ails her. Indeed, she simply keeps walking and walking...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12003!DESC.dialogue_text: ...Until finally she spies something familiar. The Glyph of Discipline, etched almost imperceptibly into a rock face, confronts her with its silent stare. Her Sigil of the same mark reacts, revealing the mouth of a cave it hides from the uninitiated.

A.response_text: Return to the Valley of Bones

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12400!DESC.dialogue_text: Leaving the bone pile behind, Eidos journeys further into the canyon. The water-cut path is littered with untold eras of fallen, rust-colored stones. The walls reach skyward blocking out the very sun. The perpetual wind steals loosened grains from the hoary sandstone, raining down mineral showers upon Eidos' hair. The canyon floor continually splits, narrows, widens, curves, bends and dips in exquisite labyrinthine form.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12401!DESC.dialogue_text: In time Eidos loses all sense of direction.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12402!DESC.dialogue_text: She becomes hopelessly lost - though despair never ails her. Indeed, she simply keeps walking and walking...

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.12403!DESC.dialogue_text: ...Until finally spying something familiar. The Glyph of Awareness, etched almost imperceptibly into a rock face, now confronts her with its silent stare. Her Sigil bearing its mark reacts, revealing the mouth of a cave hidden from the uninitiated.

A.response_text: Return to the Valley of Bones

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X003!DESCR.dialogue_text: While the bones here are concentrated in a massive heap, bleached human remains litter the entire span of the clearing. Choosing her steps carefully, Eidos nows sees that there is more than a single mound. A much smaller pile, containing what's left of a mere handful of people, is located a bit further off, and the mourning individual seems to be supplicating himself before it.\n\n\t\tDeep ruts have been carved in the earth about this place, and it appears as though salt has been sprinkled into these furrows. Curiously, the bones here give forth the only obvious vegetation in the canyon. Stalks of what look to be rust-colored wheat grow from between ribs and out of eye sockets, like drops of blood upon white robes.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.003!DESCRI.dialogue_text: While the bones here are concentrated in a massive heap, bleached human remains litter the entire span of the clearing. Choosing her steps carefully, Eidos nows sees that there is more than a single mound. A much smaller pile, containing what's left of a mere handful of people, is located a bit further off.\n\n\t\tDeep ruts have been carved in the earth about this place, and it appears as though salt has been sprinkled into these furrows. Curiously, the bones here give forth the only obvious vegetation in the canyon. Stalks of what look to be rust-colored wheat grow from between ribs and out of eye sockets, like drops of blood upon white robes.

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Halt, outlander! You approach the Valley of Bones, a most sacred Kaban site."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.001!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "What business could you possibly have here!?"

D.response_text: "...I too am in mourning."

E.response_text: "What business is it of yours to ask?"

F.response_text: "Dungeoneering! I mean to bash me a skeleton or two."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.100!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "We do not care about your fool intentions! This is a place of mourning!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.1000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "You look upon the hallowed canyon where Ark accepts her Valvorthr into the Graylands, no fit place for a heathen."

E.response_text: "I will not be hindered."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.200!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "Then explore elsewhere; this is a place of mourning!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.2000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "You look upon the hallowed canyon where Ark accepts her Valvorthr into the Graylands, no fit place for a heathen."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.300!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "Then leave; this is a place of mourning!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.3000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "You look upon the hallowed canyon where Ark accepts her Valvorthr into the Graylands, no fit place for a heathen."

D.response_text: "...But the dead I seek to honor do lie here."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.400!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "Then mourn your foreign dead, wherever they may be; this place has nothing to do with your kind!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.4000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "You look upon the hallowed canyon where Ark accepts her Valvorthr into the Graylands, no fit place for a heathen."

D.response_text: "...But the dead I seek to honor do lie here."

E.response_text: "I will not be hindered."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.500!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "I am Valvorthr Assala! Daughter of Tacriba! Chosen to watch this place of mourning!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.5000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "You look upon the hallowed canyon where Ark accepts her Valvorthr into the Graylands, no fit place for a heathen."

D.response_text: "...But the dead I seek to honor do lie here."

E.response_text: "I will not be hindered."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X600!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "The only skeleton getting bashed here is yours, Kharrspawn!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.101!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "You may not! The Valley of Bones has nothing to do with the needless wanderings of a vagrant."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X1011!ASSA.dialogue_text: "By my honor, if we are forced to slay you, I vow your bones will rot far from the protection of Ark!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.301!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "Yes, make like the setting sun, outlander."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X401!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "What honest Kaban would call a truth-blind outsider like you 'friend'!?"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.4010!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "I will have the name of your fallen comrade or you will dance with Jinns in the Graylands!"

D.response_text: "...You wouldn't know him."

E.response_text: "Your ultimatums have no sway over me, weakling."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.4011!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "What honest Kaban would call a truth-blind outsider like you 'friend'?!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.4012!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "I'll have the name of your fallen comrade or you'll dance with Jinns in the Graylands!"

D.response_text: "There are many whom Kambesh called 'friend'."

E.response_text: "Your ultimatums have no sway over me, weakling."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.501!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "Take one more step and you will be dancing with Jinns in the Graylands, Kharrspawn!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.442!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "What do you care of Kabu's plight? You must think we are fools to suffer such lies!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X442!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "I cannot allow this insult to go unanswered!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.492!ASSALA.dialogue_text: "I knew you were false! How dare you defile our hallowed dead with your lies!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Do not tempt fate, you jinnloving outlander."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.001!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "It is only by the grace of my Shariken that you breathe this hallowed air."

A.response_text: "I wish no ill will between us."

D.response_text: "...Perhaps there is a way I may win your trust."

E.response_text: "And it's also by his grace I let you live."

F.response_text: "Shuriken? I didn't know you were a ninja!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.100!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Then you should never have trod this holy place."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.200!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Do you take me for a fool?! You only feign interest in our ways!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.201!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "If you wished to know of Tacriba and the ways of Ark, you would have learned long before coming here!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.300!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "The truth-blind can only with sightless eyes."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.400!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "If there were, I certainly wouldn't be telling a Kharrlover like you about it."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.X500!ASSA.dialogue_text: "Death is too kind a punishment for you, Kharrspawn!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.000!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Halt, outlander! You approach the Valley of Bones, a most sacred Kaban site."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X001!ASSA.dialogue_text: "What business could you possibly have here!?"

B.response_text: "Is it true that you await the coming of Ark?"

D.response_text: "...You are known to me."

E.response_text: "Your master has returned."

F.response_text: "I hope you're wearing socks, because I'm about to knock them off!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X100!ASSA.dialogue_text: "I am Valvorthr Assala, daughter of Tacriba! Now state your name and purpose, outlander."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X200!ASSA.dialogue_text: "All Valvorthr have this sacred task, but how is it that an outlander like you knows this?"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X300!ASSA.dialogue_text: "And under which Jinn's instructions have you come to this sacred place, outlander?"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X500!ASSA.dialogue_text: "I will never call a Kharrloving outlander like you master! Now my spear demands an apology!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X900!ASSA.dialogue_text: "Then... the day has finally come... Archmage Ark, you have returned to us!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.902!ASSAL.dialogue_text: "Hubbiyh, open the eyes given to you by Awareness; she wields the ghelblade of our Lady!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.9020!ASSA.dialogue_text: "Only Ark possessed the strength to wield Luin, and here she returns from the very site of her death!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.9021!ASSA.dialogue_text: "Ark, most beloved of the One who looks through the Eye of Biracul! Forgive my Shariken! Though not a Valvorthr, his heart is pure."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.9022!ASSA.dialogue_text: "Shariken, I will escort her to Master Khlutt so that she can end this madness with the Wellspring!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X9023!ASS.dialogue_text: "Only she can bring peace once more to the land; you know this!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.9030!ASSA.dialogue_text: "We must pass the Gate before the morning watch appears!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.000!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "No, Assala! This woman means us no harm."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.001!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "Despite your bluster, child, we have no right to detain one of Biracul's faithful in this place."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.002!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "A warning to you, outlander: while you are free to pass through this place, do not venture too far afield."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.003!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "There is a wild, but powerful mage living deep within the recesses of the canyon."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!1.004!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "He may do you harm, he may not, but out there you will be beyond our aid."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!2.000!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "No, Assala! Despite your bluster, we have no right to detain anyone in this place; even if she does nose about like one of Khaa's boot-lickers."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!3.000!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "No, Assala! Despite your bluster, we have no right to detain anyone in this place, especially one so meek."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!4.000!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "Assala, do not strike! Despite your bluster, we have no right to detain anyone in this place, especially one who so grieves the passing of Kambesh as we do."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!5.000!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "Assala, do not strike! Despite your bluster, we have no right to detain anyone in this place, especially one so brave when faced with death."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.X000!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "What are you outlander? Be you a mage from Jer!? Or some bastard Jinn?!"

A.response_text: "I am no mage; I merely seek passage."

B.response_text: "I think it not; all I seek is understanding."

D.response_text: "...Yes, I am a mage of great renown!"

E.response_text: "All you need to know is that you live or die at my whim."

F.response_text: "No! I be an adventurer in search of the Jade Monkey!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.001!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "Assala, get off your knees and give me your aid!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0010!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "You have not been released from your oath!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0011!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "You cannot be Ark... Ark is dead!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0012!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "I think it no ill chance that you take on such a guise in these evil days for our people."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0013!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "What Jinn do I look upon, then!? Is this the countenance of Famlaz I see before me?"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0014!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "Or perhaps you are the Emerald Architect, come to take our ghosts from us!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.0015!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "Reveal your true face, Jinn, that I may strike it from the steps of Kabu!"

A.response_text: "Now, now, there's no need for violence."

B.response_text: "I do not understand... Who is Ark?"

D.response_text: "Dear Hubbiyh, do you not know the face of Ark when you see it?"

E.response_text: "I regret sparing your life. A mistake easily rectified."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.100!HUBBIY.dialogue_text: "Whatever you are, you will not live to threaten the Tacribian League or Kabu."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!7.1000!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "By my father's spear, I will send your ghost screaming back to the Graylands!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.000!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "I apologize for Assala; she has the flower of youth about her in its full blossom."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.0000!HUBB.dialogue_text: "I suggest not to speak to her unless you wish to tempt her wrath."

B.response_text: "Then could you tell me of this place?"

D.response_text: "Perhaps you should keep her on a tighter leash."

E.response_text: "That would be unfortunate for her."

F.response_text: "So wrath is a fertilizer for youth? Maybe you should start using some."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.100!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "She is a Valvorthr... But I do not expect you to know our ways - just as you should not expect me to teach them."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.101!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "And before you leave, a final warning: beware the ways of the inner valley. For they are not safe, regardless of whether one walks under the eye of Biracul or above the sword of Ark."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.X101!HUBB.dialogue_text: "May the light of the Shining One guide you, child."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.200!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "I did not say I would help you in your quest."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.201!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "You may go seek victory or death; it makes no difference to us."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.401!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "No, in fact, she is my equal in all things, save for experience."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.402!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "So you should count yourself fortunate she heeded my advice..."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.500!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "You are brave... or more likely just a jinnstruck fool."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.501!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "Assala has seen more battle and death in the Wastelands than you would see in a thousand lifetimes."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!10.600!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "You are brave to insult a Tacribian veteran... or more likely just a jinnstruck fool."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!20.X000!HUBB.dialogue_text: "Look, child, waste no more of my time or you'll join those bones over there..."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!21.000!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "I warned you, Kharrspawn! Now you're going to dance with the Jinns in the Graylands!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.X001!HUBB.dialogue_text: "What are you outlander? Be you a mage from Jer!? Or some bastard Jinn?!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!77.003!HUBBI.dialogue_text: "May the Shining One light your way..."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X000!NADUB.dialogue_text: "Leave me to my mourning, outlander... My brother must be sent off properly and I need to concentrate."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X001!NADUB.dialogue_text: "Zebh, brother of Nadub, faithful son of Biracul!\n\t\tBiracul guide you through the Graylands,\n\t\tThat you may travel safely to the One's arms."

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X002!NADUB.dialogue_text: "May your departed family join you in the One's Trueflesh!\n\t\tStay far from the jinncursed Void of Thiudan make!"

KABU!CANYON!VALLEY OF BONES!0.X003!NADUB.dialogue_text:
"Husks ghostless, leaving the Falseflesh behind,
		You have arrived first at our mutual destination.
		But when fate comes for me, Brother,
		May I too be guided into the light..."
